segments.text: How do you like the food sold in this sidewalk snack booth ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At least , it is better than my boxed lunch at work . I'm so fed up with the bland food . Thank you for having lunch with me !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Any time . But I don't mind eating boxed lunch . The food sanitation is really good too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to believe that you like it . You are so easy to be satisfied .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , it's not that bad . The food is nutritious and it's really convenient . I don't want to spend too much time on eating stuff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Eating is important . You are what you eat . It's not only a daily routine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , will you just go back to work after lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I'm going to pay the bill for the company's lunch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you didn't eat anything today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the bill is paid by month . That's probably the only thing that I like about a take-out restaurant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I'm going to the McDonald's .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For what ? I thought you didn't like western food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I never did . It's for my son . He loves it , and I made an agreement with him that he can eat it once a week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's really smart . My son Daniel is the same with your son . I just don't get it , why all the kids prefer western food to traditional food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me , either . But , it's for sure that the children market is a really big one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's for sure . It's always hard for the parents to say no to their children .
segments.speaker: S2
